attributes.action: Enforce 10mph speed limit and speed bumps and introduce the traffic signals and markings in chippenham mews
attributes.additional_details:
we need a speed limit of 10mph to be enforced and speed bumps and introduce traffic signals and markings down chippenham mews w9

residentsliving in chippenham mews w9 and parents are very concerned about their childrens attending st peters primary school in chippenham mews w9 saftey as so many children are at risk everyday to and from school and they are all being put at risk by speeding vehicles of all sizes(cars,vans,and lorries) please help us to make our children and the vunerable safe at all times .
